body.data: Absolutely, Berlin is the capital of Germany! You can think of it like the country’s heartbeat – the city where government and cultural life really pulse. If you're ever wandering through its streets, don’t miss a chance to soak up its unique vibe and history. Whether you’re strolling across the iconic Brandenburg Gate or exploring the bustling Alexanderplatz, Berlin offers a tapestry of experiences you won’t find anywhere else.
